title.description: The title of your translation dashboard, used as both the main heading and meta title of the page.

description.default: Online translation status dashboard of the project
description.description: The description of your translation dashboard, used in the meta tags of the page.

site.description: The deployed URL of your translation dashboard, used in the meta tags of the page.

basesToHide.description: Array of path bases to hide from the rendered dashboard links.

customCss.description: Array of relative paths to CSS files to be inlined into the dashboard.

lang.description: The BCP-47 tag of the dashboard's UI, used as the page's `lang` attribute, e.g. `'en'` or `'pt-BR'`.

dir.description: The directionality of the page's text, used as the page's `dir` attribute. It can be either `'ltr'` (left-to-right) or `'rtl'` (right-to-left).

statusByLocale.heading.description: The heading text that precedes the dropdown lists of each locale's individual progress.

statusByLocale.detailsSummaryFormat.description: The locale's individual status details summary format. The '{*_amount}' and `{*_word}` are placeholder values for the amount of pages (e.g. '10') in the status and the status word (e.g. 'done'), respectively.

statusByLocale.detailsTitleFormat.description: The locale's details title format. The `{locale_name} and `{locale_tag}` are placeholder valuesfor the locale's name (e.g. English) and the locale's BCP-47 tag (e.g. en), respectively.

statusByLocale.outdatedTranslationLink.description: The text for the locale's details oudated translation link.

statusByLocale.incompleteTranslationLink.description: The text for the locale's details incomplete translation link.

statusByLocale.createFileLink.description: The text for the locale's details create file link.

statusByLocale.sourceChangeHistoryLink.description: The text for the locale's details source change history link.

statusByLocale.missingKeys.description: The text for the locale's details UI dictionary missing keys heading.

statusByLocale.completeTranslation.default: This translation is complete, amazing job! üéâ
statusByLocale.completeTranslation.description: The text shown in the locale's details when it is complete.

statusByContent.heading.description: The heading text that precedes the table with all locale's status by content.

statusByContent.tableRowPage.description: The text for the status dashboard table's 'content' row head.

statusByContent.tableSummaryFormat.description: The dashboard table's summary format. The `{*_emoji}` and `{*_word}` are placeholder values for the status emoji (e.g. '‚ùå') and its word (e.g. 'missing').

name.description: The unique name of your repository in your git hosting platform, e.g. `"Yan-Thomas/lunaria"`.

branch.description: The currently tracked branch of your repository.

rootDir.description: The root directory of the project being tracked, must be set when using a monorepo.

hosting.description: The git hosting platform used by your project, e.g. `"github"` or `"gitlab"`.

label.description: The label of the locale to show in the status dashboard, e.g. `"English"`, `"Portugu√™s"`, or `"Espa√±ol"`.

lang.description: The BCP-47 tag of the locale, both to use in smaller widths and to differentiate regional variants, e.g. `"en-US"` (American English) or `"en-GB"` (British English).

location.description: A glob pattern of where your UI dictionaries are and its file type(s), e.g. `"src/i18n/en/**.ts"`.

ignore.description: Array of glob patterns to be ignored from matching.

optionalKeys.description: Record of dictionary shared paths whose values are an array of dictionary keys to be marked as optional. While defining on the default locale's object applies it to all languages, you can pass additional keys as part of the specific locale's `optionalKeys` field.

location.description: A glob pattern of where your content for the locale is and its file type(s), e.g. `"src/content/docs/en/**.mdx"`.

ignore.description: Array of glob patterns to be ignored from matching.

ignoreKeywords.description: Array of commit keywords that avoid a commit from trigerring status changes.

translatableProperty.description: Name of the frontmatter property used to mark a page as ready for translation.

regex.description: The regex pattern to find the path section to be replaced. You can use :locales to dynamically add a list of all the locales in the format `'es|pt|ar'`.

localePathReplaceWith.description: The content that will be replaced into the `toLocalePath` regex's match. You can use :locale to dynamically add the current locale for you to replace with.

sharedPathReplaceWith.description: The content that will be replaced into the `toSharedPath` regex's match.

routingStrategy.description: The routing strategy used by your framework, used to properly generate paths from a locale's path.

outDir.description: A relative directory path of where your dashboard will build to, e.g. `"./dist/translation-status/index.html"`.

cloneDir.description: The relative directory path of your git history clone, exclusively made when running on a shallow repository, e.g. `"./dist/history"`

renderer.description: The relative path to a valid `.(c/m)js` or `.(c/m)ts` file containing your dashboard renderer configuration.
